website_summaries.verdict: High price for a 30-foot battle rope, but you'll receive hardware to anchor it to a wall.
pros: Good construction quality throughout the battle rope, including high-quality handles
Offered in lengths between 30 and 50 feet
With a 1.5-inch diameter, this battle rope works great for people with varying levels of fitness
Ships with an anchor kit that will allow you to use this battle rope in many locations and for many different types of exercise
cons: More expensive than others, but you're paying a bit extra for the anchor kit

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, timely delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, timely delivery. The handles are well constructed. I bought the 30ft length and it is perfect for my garage gym. Absolutely love this product!!! First workout was 6 rounds of 20 sec on with 10 sec rest and my shoulders were exploding. Fairly priced, overall greatly satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hefty
customer_reviews.text: These ropes are just right. They are heavy and make for an intense addition to the garage gym. The color is perfect for my red and black theme. I could have spent a little less on a different rope but I really wanted the red/black to match my other equipment. The anchor point hardware seems decent enough. I recommend this to anyone who might be interested.
customer_reviews.author: Zacc Kernper

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good value.
customer_reviews.text: The battle ropes arrived quickly and have been put to the test regularly since. The ropes “handles” are really good. The rope itself began fraying a bit after only 2 sessions but it has to be mentioned that they were being used on a pretty rough blacktop surface. Compared to other ropes I have used, these are pretty good. I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Stephan

customer_reviews.title: Hey wanna see my big rope?
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted, another way to torture myself into shape. Use for another station on my circuit HIIT workout routine. Great product, make my arms feel like wet noodles after a couple rounds.
customer_reviews.author: Some Jerk

customer_reviews.title: My son loves the challenge of this battle rope!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this battle rope for my 22 year old son. I knew nothing about battle ropes. But after doing a lot of research I chose this one. I am not disappointed! It got great reviews and my son loves it! He says it’s a challenge and a really good workout! Strong and durable!
customer_reviews.author: Ringer dinger

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and buy
customer_reviews.text: Honestly not too much to be said, this rope is good, durable, and gets the job done. Don't hesitate to buy if this is the kind of thing you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: HonestlyFrank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are super heavy and great for a work out!
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: 40 ft 1.5 handle
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Look is perfect and matches the red and black theme for my gym. It’s nice and heavy and will burn fat off like crazy. Anchors are awesome and used two 45lbs Olympic weights as an anchor. A couple frayed areas but holds up even after I gave it considerable beating. Overall a fantastic must have equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Lim

customer_reviews.title: This core exercise compliments your overall work out and is a great warm up and
customer_reviews.text: definitely worth the money!!! This core exercise compliments your overall work out and is a great warm up and finsiher
customer_reviews.author: Robert Griffin

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and works great for Gym exercises at home.
customer_reviews.author: luz carvalho

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The price is right with the included anchor point. Been learning how to use this equipment from online vids.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rope in April. It’s only used in a garage gym on stall mats, no concrete. The rope is already fraying extensively and unraveling in a section. It’s used a few days a week only. No way this should be coming apart already
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Battle Ropes!
customer_reviews.text: they were delivered earlier than expected and have been great so far. well made product and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Colin S.

customer_reviews.title: You need to order an anchor.
customer_reviews.text: I would rate this higher, but the product says it comes with an anchor, but it doesn’t come with the actual anchor, just the clip. I bought this as a gift for my trainer who was opening her own gym and felt terrible when I learned she had to order an anchor.
customer_reviews.author: Shy Q

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is high quality and arrived fairly quick on just the standard delivery. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but heavier than I thought they would be. Need a lighter rope.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Best Product for Cost
customer_reviews.text: Rope was exactly as advertised and for a low price compared to others I researched. Easy to set up with the anchor that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph J Palumbo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Rope came without anchor kit - contacted CS and was immediately sent. Very heavy and durable battle rope - Very pleased THANK YOU!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I get an amazing workout with these. They were just what I was looking forward too
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Great Rope!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well constructed product and totally met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Blenda S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Find some pretty battle rope exercises that I have implemented into my weekly routine.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Lopez

customer_reviews.title: I love this rope
customer_reviews.text: I love this rope! It's a great addition to my workout routine and I look forward to getting stronger and moving up to the heavier one.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A. Skeen-Morris

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: very tough and sturdy equipment. The workout it gives you is worth every dollar. Would 100% recommend to another prospective buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Zachery K.

customer_reviews.title: They are heavy
customer_reviews.text: Nice, heavy with a solid feel. I upgraded from lighter ropes after 1 year and I can immediately feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mayes

customer_reviews.title: As a fitness trainer with over 30 years experience, ...
customer_reviews.text: As a fitness trainer with over 30 years experience, I insist on quality when I buy a product for my gym. The Iron Bull Battle Ropes were just that.
customer_reviews.author: Earnest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time, as described. I'm loving the workout !
customer_reviews.author: Adil Wasi

customer_reviews.title: Love these ropes!!! So fun!! Great quality! Great workout!
customer_reviews.text: On my gosh I love these battle ropes! Can't wait to order more and want to order a base plate.... tough and durable... great grips on them... great quality!!! I teach a Bootcamp and so excited to get a few more to incorporate them into my class! Great product that gives a awesome workout💪🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality, make sure you try out ropes at a gym or something to ensure you buy the correct weight, I wish I would of bought the heavier ones. 30lbs doesn't feel like 30lbs of resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Tom csala

customer_reviews.title: Big metal piece not included
customer_reviews.text: They are indeed ropes. The anchor kit came a week late and only after I sqwauked about it. There is no metal anchor as shown in description which is why I ordered it. So create your own tie down to which you will attach anchor kit which is two nylon straps and a carabiner. Read the description! I'm giving it a three because of the advertising picture.
customer_reviews.author: Doug D.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my needs. Its a plus that the anchor kit is included. The rope is well made, and the plastic handles are wearing well with use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it looks like the nylon is about to untangled and I realize that I didn't receive the ropes that was on display the handle says IronBull! it had nothing I also never had a plastic to put over the loose part of the rope.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battle Ropes
customer_reviews.text: My son and I haven't had time to set them up yet. With everything else going on, but that's next on our to do list. Once we do then we can get cracking. Get the pun? We're excited to start using them for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Part-time shopper 57

product_meta.title: Battle Ropes with Anchor Kit and Nylon Protector Included - Fitness Undulation Rope Exercise - Cross Strength Training - Circuits Workout
product_meta.description:
Experience Extreme Workouts with our Battle Ropes

The new Iron Bull Strength's Battle Ropes are great conditioning tools that not only improve your cardio but will provide a full body workout with a focus on improving muscle endurance and strength. It helps build core and arm strength and is excellent for burning tons of calories. You can create different full body workouts by performing slams, waves, jacks, throws, pulls and more! 

Who can benefit from using battle ropes?

For many years now, mixed martial artists have used battle ropes with extreme results by improving cardio and muscle endurance at the same time. Battle ropes have now become a staple for high level athletes, strongmen and crossfitters for improving body composition, strength and endurance with minimal joint strain and maximal aerobic and anaerobic output. The results are simply too good to miss out 

Main Features:

-High Quality PolyDacron

-Water, weather and shed proof

-Nylon Protector to prevent damage and fraying

-Anchor kit included to workout anywhere, anytime

-Comfortable and resistant heat shrinked grips

Built tough for your workouts, our battle ropes are durable, effective and fully portable and will last many years of usage and give you the results you want. Highly recommended for crossfit, strength and fitness training, athletes, military, boxers and gyms

 Battle Rope Weights: 

➤ 1.5” x 30’: 18 lbs
➤ 1.5” x 40’: 23 lbs 
➤ 1.5” x 50’: 28 lbs 
➤ 2.0” x 30’: 30 lbs 
➤ 2.0” x 40’: 38 lbs 
➤ 2.0” x 50’: 46 lbs 

Select your size and Click on the Yellow "Add to Cart" button above Now to MAXIMIZE your workout and experience the RESULTS of battle ropes workout.
feature_bullets: PERFECT WORKOUT: Our Premium Battle Ropes are great conditioning tools that not only improve your cardio but will provide a full body workout with a focus on improving muscle endurance and strength. It helps build core and arm strength and is excellent for burning tons of calories.

ANCHOR KIT INCLUDED : Every battle rope comes with everything you need to workout anywhere quickly and easily. We’ve two 2"x16" nylon anchor straps with double sewn, strong (1500lbs) nylon webbing and one carabiner to securely and safely anchor your rope. Simply use one strap to wrap around your rope and the other to wrap around any anchor point you find and start your workout instantly.

PREMIUM QUALITY: Our battle ropes are made from the highest quality PolyDacron material for maximum flexibility and whip action. We’ve added a Nylon sleeve to prevent wear and fraying and used heat shrink wraps to seal the ends to make a convenient grip. We’ve used the highest quality available making our battle ropes extremely durable.

PERFECT DESIGN: Our battle ropes are originally designed to withstand the rigors of shipyard. We’ve simply made them shorter and used the best quality material available to provide the best weight to length ratio and make them virtually water, weather and shed proof!
DIFFERENT BATTLE ROPE WEIGHTS: We offer different sizes and weights for all fitness levels. The heavier the battle rope, the harder it is! Battle Rope Weights Guide in Description.
